markdown.markdown: ## 2023--24 Final projects | Team | Project | |------|--------------------------------------------------------------| |   [Gabi Harel, Yoav Abeyv, Rotem Porat](https://github.com/Gabriella38/Agrotech-Final/) | Monitoring Microbial Metabolism | |   [Ella Faruchi, Rotem David, Matar Tal, Asif Charazi](https://github.com/Ella-Faruchi/agrotech/) | The Eggs-periment | |   [Gil Lifshitz, Matar Shema](https://github.com/GiLifshitz/Baby_sensor) | Baby Sensor | |   [Neta Cohen Simhi, Omer Meyer, Itai David, Aya Even Dar](https://github.com/NetaCohenSimhi/composensor) | Compost Monitoring System | |   [Gali Shaani, Yonatan Schwartz](https://github.com/Yonatansch12/Agrotech-Lab-71252/blob/main/README.md) | Seed counter | ## 2022--23 Final projects | Team | Project | |------|--------------------------------------------------------------| |   [Aviv Tzafrir, Daniel Shiller, Guy Dabby](https://github.com/dash1010/Hydrofonic-system) | Hydroponic system | |   [Orel Suliman, Yotam Menachem](https://github.com/Yotam-Menachem/Agro-Tech-Lab-Plant-propagation-GreenHouse/tree/main) | Greeny - Plant-propagation-GreenHouse | |   [Guy Brauner, Victoria Sholohov, Shir Avraham](https://github.com/VikaShol/Agrotech_Lab_2023) | Humidity control | |   [Eliraz Shomron](https://github.com/elirazshomron/Agtech_project) | Plant water system management | |   [Yovel Rodoy](https://github.com/yovelrod/Agrotech_Lab_2023/tree/main) | meteorological station | |   [Yael Halperin, Oded Hollander, Shachar Miller](https://github.com/OdedHol/agrotech) | Deep Water Culture (DWC) | |   [Bnaya Hami, Alon Dror, Michal Mannes](https://github.com/BnayaHami/Balcony_gardener) | Balcony gardener | |   [Ran Avner, Omer Eyal, Zohar Batito](https://github.com/ranavner/real_time_dashboard) | smart watering system ## 2021--22 Final projects | Team | Project | |------|--------------------------------------------------------------| |   [Ronna Melamed Bat -- May Nir](https://github.com/mayniragqueen/agrotech-project) | Measuring PAR outside and inside the greenhouse | |   [Avital Akerman -- Elad Greenfeld](https://github.com/vitoska26/agrotech_project) | Automated Irrigation System | |   [Nadav Hen -- Guy Donagi -- David Zingerman](https://github.com/puginarug/GreenTemp) | Temporal and spatial temperature measurement in a greenhouse | |   [Zeev Rozman -- Imri Zadak -- Alex Evenko-Greenapple](https://github.com/Alevegreen/Agtechcourse_finproject) | weather station | |   [Yuval Chemke -- Reem Har Levi](https://github.com/yuvalchemke/-Hydrophonics---Monitoring-and-Balance-by-detection) | Hydroponics Monitoring and Balance | |   [Peleg Atir -- Aviad Mendelovich -- Ruth Yitzhaki](https://github.com/Ruthyitzhaki/Agrotech-lab-2022) | VPD control using automatic sprinklers | |   [Amir Sheffer -- Yitzchak Kanovsky -- Aviv Saadia](https://github.com/amirsheffer/Agro-tech-project) | 3D heatmap model of a greenhouse |
